chapters.title: Chapter 1: An Empty Road
chapters.info: Nynaeve al'Meara is a 24-year-old woman from Emond's Field. She has brown hair and eyes, and is quite slender. She studied under Doral Barran, the Wisdom of Emond's Field. After Mistress Barran's death, Nynaeve herself became the Wisdom. Her adult height is about as tall as Mat's shoulder. Many people still think Nynaeve is too young to be the Wisdom; however, mentioning this to her is a good way to get whacked by the stick she carries.
